task_prefix: The bank marketing dataset is related to direct marketing campaigns of a Portuguese banking institution. The marketing campaigns were based on phone calls to convince clients to subscribe to a bank term deposit. Often, more than one contact to the same client was required. The dataset includes client demographic data, campaign information, and socio-economic indicators. Each example contains 16 features. Predicting whether a client will subscribe to a term deposit based on direct marketing campaign data. Useful for optimizing marketing strategies.

column_descriptions.Last contact day of the month: Last contact day of the month (numeric: 1-31)
column_descriptions.Last contact duration: Last contact duration in seconds (numeric). Important note: this attribute highly affects the output target
column_descriptions.Number of contacts during this campaign: Number of contacts performed during this campaign and for this client (includes last contact)
column_descriptions.Days since last contact from previous ca: Number of days that passed by after the client was last contacted from a previous campaign (-1 means client was not previously contacted)
column_descriptions.Number of contacts before this campaign: Number of contacts performed before this campaign and for this client
column_descriptions.Outcome of previous marketing campaign: Outcome of the previous marketing campaign (categorical: 'failure', 'other', 'success', 'unknown')

class_description: Classes: 'yes' (Client subscribed to a term deposit), 'no' (Client did not subscribe to a term deposit)
